Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory608.jpg'}
{3: "It's several hours past sunset by the time you're done dealing with Pickman's minions and settling the refugees in."}

{3: 'The Constructs are still busy reviewing the data at the collection point beside Conservation Area 104. Echo, on the other hand, has gathered up a bunch of items on her own and taken them to a nearby empty lot.'}
{3: 'Paper products, dirty bandages, old decorations, etc.—these are the things that lie around her feet now.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg3801_10.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Echo squats down and gathers them into a pile. Moments later, she produces a lighter—and sets these ownerless items on fire.'}
{3: 'She is only inches away from the burning pile as specks of ash flutter in the rising, heated air, close enough to catch a few if they drift her way.'}
{3: 'As you look at Echo, you wonder if her weird apology from earlier had anything to do with what the guy had said about her.'}
{3: 'You find yourself standing next to her now, your feet seemingly having carried you here with a mind of their own.'}
{3: "Still not entirely sure what you want to say, you're caught in the awkward silence of the moment."}
{2: "I wouldn't take whatever that guy just said personally.", 3: '16'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: 'You mean those people who just got taken away?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Echo puts on a barely noticeable smile.'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: "Makes sense that they don't understand what I'm trying to do... when Pickman has done such a good job brainwashing them so thoroughly.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: "Don't worry, though. I'm not going to give up just because of a few words.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: 'Why did I apologize just now?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: 'I wanted to apologize to you for making a move on my own and putting all of you at risk.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: "I'm willing to accept any judgment and punishment that might come my way, but I just thought I owed you all an apology...", 4: '1'}
{2: "That's definitely blowing things out of proportion here...", 3: '25'}
{2: 'Just try not to do that again.', 3: '26', 4: "I'm just glad it all ended well.", 5: '27'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: "I'll try not to.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'At least nothing serious has happened to us.', 3: '28'}
{2: 'And the transport craft is just having a minor hiccup.', 3: '29'}
{2: 'Still, I never want to see you hurt.', 3: '30'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: "...Right. Yes, I'll follow the rules going forward.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: "So long as there's still going back, that is...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'What do you mean?', 3: '33'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: "It's been a while now since Pickman and his central flying fortress went down.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: "His headquarters have been staying in touch with all these branches of Utopia out there, but these people probably already had a hunch about what'd happened to Pickman...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Echo nods at you.'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: 'They seemed to have learned something from an outsider visiting them last night when I was watching them.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: 'And at noon today, they put all the refugees into some of the bigger tents to stop them from going wherever they wanted to.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: "Some of the guards started burning printed materials... and I thought it wouldn't be long before they started doing away with the refugees.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Which is why you decided to interfere, I presume?', 3: '41'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: 'Right. I did a quick headcount of the guards and figured I should be able to handle them on my own just fine.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: 'Not knowing they were so heavily armed, that is...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: "Well... sure glad I didn't end up worse than I did.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: "I do have a hard time forgetting all the people I couldn't save, though.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Says Echo as she turns to face the fire that's still burning—and that's when it hits you that these items belonged to those who didn't survive the battle..."}
{2: 'Echo', 3: 'Cecily was very quiet. She would always tell me all these fairy tales after "work," and this ornament with a hawk on it was her favorite.', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Echo', 3: 'Nata wore her heart on her sleeve and was always brimming with energy. I was pretty surprised when I found out that she loved reading these books that... you know, numb the heart.', 4: '1'}
{3: "People were probably just going about their everyday business carrying these things—until Utopia's peace was shattered."}
{2: "This isn't your fault.", 3: '53'}
{2: 'There is no way for you to save everyone...', 3: '54', 4: 'You already gave it your all.', 5: '54'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: "I think I was only trying so hard because that's where I grew up.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: 'And feel free to let me know if you find that a little...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'I would have done the same.', 3: '57'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: 'Really? You would?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Of course. I mean, people have had their doubts about me.', 3: '60'}
{2: 'But I would have done the same nonetheless.', 3: '61'}
{2: 'There you go.', 3: '63'}
{3: 'You put on a funny face as you throw up your hands, which cracks Echo up and brings a smile back to her face.'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: "Well, that's something I never knew about the Gray Raven Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: 'See, I totally thought you were a...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'You totally thought I was a...?', 3: '68'}
{3: 'She bites her lip in hesitation.'}
{2: "Trust me. I've probably heard something way worse."}
{2: 'Echo', 3: "Ahem... I think I'd prefer it if you gave me some time to come up with a better way to put it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: 'But anyhow, thank you, Commandant.', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Echo', 3: "So, I take it that you're here to give me a pep talk? That's nice of you. Seems like Babylonia treats people a lot nicer than how they treated us at Utopia, in a realistic way.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Says Echo as memories belonging to Lena pop up in her M.I.N.D.'}
{3: 'Echo can now seem to wrap her head around the ad hoc squad and all those different figures.'}
{2: 'You should totally give it a try sometime.', 3: '80'}
{2: 'As in when all of this is over. What say you?', 3: '83'}
{2: 'Echo', 3: "...Sure. I'll sleep on that.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Says Echo, with a smile that looks obviously forced. It's anyone's guess what just crossed her mind."}
